item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by John Connolly
item.description: "For in every adult there dwells the child that was, and in every child there lies the adult that will be." -- John Connolly

item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by Maurice Sendak
item.description: "And now," cried Max, "let the wild rumpus start!" -- Maurice Sendak

item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by A.A. Milne
Bronwyn add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "To die would be an awfully big adventure." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by lewis carroll
item.description: "If you drink much from a bottle marked 'poison' it is certain to disagree with you sooner or later." -- lewis carroll

item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Until I feared I would lose it, I never loved to read. One does not love breathing." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by Richard Russo
item.description: "After all, what was the whole wide world but a place for people to yearn for their heart's impossible desires, for those desires to become entrenched in defiance of logic, plausibility, and even the passage of time, as eternal as polished marble. " -- Richard Russo

item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "There [is] no innocence more dangerous than the innocence of age." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "It's like Tolstoy said. Happiness is an allegory, unhappiness a <i>story</i>." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by Seth Grahame-Smith
item.description: "put the car in "d" set the compass to "n" and get the "f"out of there" -- Seth Grahame-Smith

item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "I'm always happy," Sasha said. "Sometimes I just forget." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Bronwyn add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss
